name: Mass Effect Package
summary: Learn about .PCC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PCC files are typically found in the BioGame\â€‹CookedPC directory within a Mass Effect 2 installation. An example PCC file is BIOG_HMF_ARM_SHP_R.pcc, where "HMF" stands for a Human Female character.
NOTE: PCC files are similar to .UPK files.

description: File used by Mass Effect 2 and 3, a first person shooter game based on the Unreal Engine 3 gaming engine; may contain various game data, including models, textures, and rooms; commonly used to modify (or "mod") game content.
